message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I'll take the lead, let's see if you'll follow
I'll give you a bit more, but don't expect me to go higher!
You're getting closer, but I'm not done yet!
You're not getting all the cake, Bob! I'm making a better offer!
You're getting desperate, Alice! I'm making my move!
I'm not giving up yet! This is my best offer, take it or leave it!
You're running out of time, Alice! I'm making my final push!
